Package main.devices.sensors.temp

Class DHT11

java.lang.Object
main.core.Device
main.devices.sensors.Sensor
main.devices.sensors.temp.TempSensor
main.devices.sensors.temp.DHT11
public class DHT11 extends TempSensor
DHT11 class that extends the TempSensor class. Represents an DHT11 tempsensor device that uses OneWire protocol.

  • Constructor Details

    • DHT11

      public DHT11(Protocol protocol, int devId)
      Constructs an DHT11 device with the specified protocol and device ID. Ensures the protocol is an instance of OneWire for this DHT11 device.
      Parameters:
      protocol - The protocol used by the DHT11 device (must be OneWire).
      devId - The unique identifier for the DHT11 device.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the protocol is not an instance of OneWire.

  • Method Details

    • turnOn

      public void turnOn()
      Turns on the DHT11 tempsensor. The device state is changed to State.ON, and a "turnON" command is sent via the protocol.
      Specified by:
      turnOn in class Device
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the DHT11 is already on.

    • turnOff

      public void turnOff()
      Turns off the DHT11 tempsensor. The device state is changed to State.OFF, and a "turnOFF" command is sent via the protocol.
      Specified by:
      turnOff in class Device
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the DHT11 is already off.

    • getDevId

      public int getDevId()
      Returns the unique identifier of the DHT11 device.
      Specified by:
      getDevId in class Device
      Returns:
      The device ID of the DHT11.

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the DHT11 device.
      Specified by:
      getName in class Device
      Returns:
      The name of the DHT11, which is "DHT11" for this class.
